channel.title: More help with xprate!
channel.description:
How do I change it? No one told me. And none of my friends will help me. I'm trying to make a better economy for my server. So how do I change it for each skill or all skills. Please help, thanks.
-Diluted

item.title: More help with xprate!
item.dc:creator: @xxDiluted2xx xxDiluted2xx
item.description:
@xxDiluted2xx wrote:

[quote=“Jordiescape, post:2, topic:284873”]Search for…

TotalExp

I get all of this stuff…

                            TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
                        } else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                        } else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (750 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
                        } else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
                        {
                            TotalExp = (double) (700 * hitDiff);
                            TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                            addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
                        }
                        TotalExp = (double) (200 * hitDiff);
                        TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
                        addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
                        actionTimer = 7;

I think I change the 750 or 700 and stuff like that? How do I know which ones they are and how do I change them?

Read full topic
